on reading compounds: 橋【キョウ】pons (pontes), pons Varolii, pontine, part of the brain stem (links the medulla oblongata and cerebellum with the midbrain)
橋脚【キョウキャク】bridge pier, pontoon bridge
桟橋【サンバシ】wharf, bridge, jetty, pier
kun reading compounds: 橋渡し【はしわたし】bridge building, mediation, go-between, intermediary, (through the) good offices (of someone)
浮き橋【うきはし】floating bridge, pontoon bridge
